MQTTClient.SendAuthPacket (METH)
MQTTClient.SendAuthPacket (METH)
Â¶
METHOD SendAuthPacket : BOOL
Method to send AUTH packets to the server (MQTT V5 only).
This method can be called to send an AUTH response to the server if a AUTH packet has been received.
see MQTTClient.mQTTConnackProperties.xAuthPacketReceived
